alert.note: Alert for Jersey (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Saint Louis (Eastern Missouri and West Central Illinois)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 28 at 9:16PM CDT until further notice by NWS Saint Louis
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the Mississippi River at the following locations... Mississippi River at LaGrange. Mississippi River at Winfield. Mississippi River at Saverton. Mississippi River at Canton. Mississippi River at Louisiana. Mississippi River at Clarksville. Mississippi River at Grafton. River forecasts are based on observed precipitation and forecast precipitation for the next 24 hours. ...FLOOD WARNING FOR SNOWMELT REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM TUESDAY EVENING UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Mississippi River at Grafton. * WHEN...From Tuesday evening until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 21.0 feet, Water begins flooding the floor at the Palisades Marina in Portage Des Sioux. Access to homes along North Shore Drive in eastern St. Charles County becomes cut off near this height. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:00 PM CDT Friday the stage was 18.4 feet. - Bankfull stage is 18.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage Tuesday evening and continue rising to 20.8 feet Thursday evening. Additional rises are possible thereafter. - Flood stage is 20.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (7:00 am) Location Stg Stage Sun Mon Tue Wed Thu Mississippi River Grafton 20.0 18.4 19.0 19.4 19.8 20.3 20.6 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. This product, along with additional weather and stream information, is available at https://water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=lsx.
